name: hyperactivity

(of a person) the state of having more energy than is normal, becoming excited easily, and being unable to stay still or think about work: Their son has been diagnosed with a hyperactivity disorder. He uses a sedative to control his hyperactivity. See

There is growing concern over the increasing use of drugs to treat hyperactivity in children.
